update voucher_subject_summary

inner_flag = #{innerFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
subject_code = #{subjectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(id,0) from voucher_subject_summary where voucher_date = #{voucherDay} order by id desc limit 1 ;
SELECT ifnull(id,0) from voucher_subject_summary where voucher_date = #{voucherDay} order by id asc limit 1 ;

select
from voucher_subject_summary where id between #{startRow} and #{endRow} and voucher_date = #{voucherDay} ;
